price: 8. Diggah yeemcneeh mcqc taamoomi abbaasite mari Yallah tet caglisak aggiriqqe sinni galtd-lon Yallih garil.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
